arts.ttl: Liverpool to pay tribute to Diogo Jota and Andre Silva at Preston friendly
arts.sum: Players from both teams will wear black armbands, Liverpool said. The pre-match programme will also feature written tributes to Jota and Silva.

arts.ttl: 'Broken' commentator apologises in response to Diogo Jota tributes at Preston vs Liverpool
arts.sum: Liverpool fans and players alike were caught up in the emotion of the club's first match following the passing of Diogo Jota and tributes were paid throughout at Deepdale

arts.ttl: Liverpool: Paul Heckingbottom proud as Preston help commemorate Diogo Jota with emotional pre-season tributes
arts.sum: The Reds’ first pre-season friendly on the summer was a mere sideshow

arts.ttl: Liverpool and Preston players and fans remember ‘champion’ Diogo Jota
arts.sum: As Liverpool play their first game since the forward’s tragic death, Arne Slot says the best way to move on is to be ‘like Jota was’ The first rendition of “Oh, his name is Diogo” came 20 minutes before kick-off and, 20 minutes into Liverpool’s first game since the tragic deaths of Diogo Jota and André Silva, the entire crowd at Preston’s Deepdale stadium stood to honour their memory. Mohamed Salah was visibly moved by the ovation for his club’s “Forever 20”. It was the aftermath of a poignant and important afternoon for Liverpool that left the deepest impression, however. For seven minutes after the pre-season friendly, staged 10 days after the brothers were killed in a car accident in north-western Spain, Liverpool fans in the Bill Shankly Stand sang Jota’s name on repeat. And for those seven minutes Liverpool’s players, coaches and backroom staff stood facing their fans and clapped in unison with the tribute. The connection and the release, if only brief and only temporary, vindicated Liverpool’s decision to get back to work and play. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Liverpool hand debuts to new stars and pay tribute to Diogo Jota in Preston win
arts.sum: Arne Slot's Liverpool started their preseason with a 3-1 win over Preston North End at Deepdale on Sunday afternoon as they remembered Diogo Jota and his brother Andre Silva.

arts.ttl: Liverpool pay emotional tribute to Diogo Jota at Preston friendly
arts.sum: Liverpool have been in mourning since the news of Jota’s death came early on the morning of July 3.

arts.ttl: How Liverpool's four debutants fared at Preston as Arne Slot gets glimpse of future
arts.sum: PRESTON 1-3 LIVERPOOL: The Reds won their opening pre-season friendly of the summer as tributes were paid to Diogo Jota both on and off the pitch at Deepdale

arts.ttl: Preston 1-3 Liverpool: Emotional tributes to Diogo Jota as Reds begin pre-season with a win
arts.sum: Travelling Reds support sang the late Portuguese’s name throughout the tie

arts.ttl: Liverpool Begin Healing Process With Touching Diogo Jota Tributes Against Preston
arts.sum: There were numerous emotional nods to the late Diogo Jota before, during and after Liverpool’s first match since his passing.

arts.ttl: Real reason Florian Wirtz missed Liverpool's emotional first pre-season fixture at Preston
arts.sum: Liverpool handed £29million new boy Girogi Mamardashvili his debut against Championship club Preston North End, with the giant goalkeeper the only one of six new arrivals to start the game at Deepdale, with the four other new faces on the bench.
